body:
Support for external find:

```shell
$ spack external find fzf
==> The following specs have been detected on this system and added to /home/paul/.spack/packages.yaml
fzf@0.20.0
$ cat ~/.spack/packages.yaml 
packages:
  fzf:
    externals:
    - spec: fzf@0.20.0
      prefix: /usr
```

Added latest version (0.22.0) and conditions to package to continue support for older versions. With `go mod` there is no longer a need for Glide that was relied upon in the previous installs.
title: Updated FZF package for newer versions.
